name: NetAlertX
longDescription: Get visibility of what's going on on your WIFI/LAN network. Schedule scans for devices, port changes and get alerts if unknown devices or changes are found. Write your own Plugins with auto-generated UI and in-build notification system. Build out and easily maintain your network source of truth (NSoT).
description: WIFI / LAN intruder detector. Scans for devices connected to your network and alerts you if new and unknown devices are found
